original_text: Moses had told all the Lord's commands to Joshua. Joshua obeyed all the Lord's commands. He did everything that the Lord had told Moses.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 종 모세에게 명령하신 것을 모세는 여호수아에게 명령하였고 여호수아는 그대로 행하여 여호와께서 모세에게 명하신 모든 것을 하나도 행하지 아니한 것이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Moses had told all the Lord's commands
Joshua obeyed all the Lord's commands
that the Lord had told Moses
